channel.title: Worships on First Baptist Church Muncie
channel.description: Recent content in Worships on First Baptist Church Muncie

item.title: The Ultimate Sign
item.description: Jesus’ raising Lazarus from the dead is a powerful story.

item.title: More Signs
item.description: From John 5-10, Jesus continues to explain, clarify, and prove his identity as the Son of God, the Messiah.

item.title: New Birth
item.description: The familiar story of Nicodemus reminds us that we must experience new birth in order to enter the Kingdom of God.

item.title: The First Miracle
item.description: Jesus’ first miracle or sign was the changing of water to wine at the wedding of a close relative or family friend.

item.title: Jesus' Baptism
item.description: The first verses of John’s Gospel are mind-bending.

item.title: Belief and Life
item.description: As we begin a series on John’s gospel, we discuss his intentions in recording his experiences with Jesus.

item.title: Facing the New Year
item.description: As we come to the end of 2020 and all of the unique challenges and tragedies it brought, many cannot help but look at 2021 with continued fear and anxiety.

item.title: Christmas Eve
item.description: As we come to the final worship celebration of the season of Advent, we light the white Christ candle.

item.title: Mary
item.description: In this final Sunday of Advent, we consider the extreme faith and submission of Mary.
